title: 713. Week 1 Big Games, First Impressions & Rookie Report Card
itunes:title: 713. Week 1 Big Games, First Impressions & Rookie Report Card
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis look back at the weekend and all the action from Week 1 of the NFL season. The guys start by breaking down the big 3 games from Sunday. Next, the group discuss the Arizona Cardinals dominant victory over the Tennessee Titans. After that, the trio give their first impressions from the weekend. Then, the guys give a grade to the rookie starters based off their Week 1 performances. Following that, the trio look at if the Atlanta Falcons made a mistake passing on a quarterback with their first-round pick in the 2021 NFL Draft. To wrap up the show, DJ, Bucky and Rhett give their final thoughts from the weekend.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
